item.title: Version 5.3.0
item.description:
Focusmo 5.3.0

Whatâ€™s New

  • Deep Focus Mode: A new distraction-free work mode designed to help you maintain intense concentration during important tasks
  • Daily Goals & Streaks: Set daily focus goals and track your streaks to build consistent work habits
  • Enhanced Analytics: New minimal and detailed views to make it easier to understand your productivity patterns and track your progress
  • Menu Bar Updates: Show task title and progress in menubar Special thanks to ygeorgik for the great suggestions
  • Pomodoro Improvements: Pomodoro is independent of task timer and works like normal pomodoro timers now
  • More Accessible Features: Many previously premium features are now available to all users, including unlimited timer duration and task creation
  • Floating Timer: See daily goal progress in floating timer
  • Keyboard Shortcuts for Timer End Screens: Quickly move between options using arrow keys and select with enter Thank you nickwolf for the suggestion

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed issues with analytics data not displaying correctly
  • Fixed: Break timer starts early even after time increase Big thanks to -y-hetrel for the detailed report
  • Fixed: Session does not reset on manual break Also reported by -y-hetrel - much appreciated!
  • Improved overall app performance and responsiveness
  • Fixed: Auto updates not working
  • Fixed: Activity tracking major performace issues Shoutout to christopher for flagging this

Technical Improvements

  • Enhanced app stability and performance
  • Better data synchronization across features
  • Improved user interface responsiveness
